players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Alice, she seems suspicious."
You: "Bob is the mafioso, I'm sure of it. We should investigate his house."
